settings.text: Shoe sizing, especially online, is not a perfect process. That’s why we offer free exchanges for all US orders. You can read our full return/exchange policy here.

Ordering outside of the US? We have sites for the EU and UK, as well as a number of online retailers in many countries like the Canada, Australia and Israel. Be sure to check out our store locator here.

settings.custom_html: <iframe width="100%" height="500" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0HEqK7ygHMA" title="How to Find the Right Size For Your Xero Shoes" frameborder="0" allow=" accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>

settings.text: Here are additional sizing recommendations — and size conversion charts — for our shoes and sandals.

Z-Trail EV – The Z-Trail EV sport sandal fits true to size. You can confirm your size with the printable templates below.*

Z-Trek -The Z-Trek sport sandal runs about 1/2 size large, but only comes in whole sizes. You can confirm your size with the printable templates below.*

Naboso Trail -The Naboso Trail sport sandal fits true to size. You can confirm your size with the printable templates below. Use the Z-Trail as a guide.*

Previous Styles:

Colorado – The Colorado fits true to size.*

Toronto – The Toronto fits true to size.*

Oswego – The Oswego fits true to size.*

TerraFlex – Men – On July 30th, 2019 we updated the sizing for the Men’s Terraflex, it now fits true to size.*

TerraFlex – Women – On August 6th, 2019 we updated the sizing for the Women’s Terraflex, it now fits true to size.*

Alston – The Alston fits true to size.*

Veracruz -The Veracruz sport sandal fits true to size. You can confirm your size with the printable templates below. Use the Z-Trail as a guide.*

Z-Trail – The Z-Trail sport sandal fits true to size. You can confirm your size with the printable templates below.*

Melbourne – The Melbourne ran a bit large. We recommended choosing 1/2 size smaller than your usual size.*

Daylite Hiker EV – Women – On September 19th, 2019 we updated the sizing for the Women’s Daylite Hiker. We originally recommended a full size larger than your usual size prior to that date. We then recommended choosing 1/2 size larger after that date.*

Daylite Hiker EV – Men – On September 20th, 2019 we updated the sizing for the Men’s Daylite Hiker. We originally recommended a full size larger than your usual size prior to that date. We then recommended choosing 1/2 size larger after that date.*

Xcursion – Men & Women – The Xcursion fit true to size.*

Coalton – The Coalton fit true to size.*

Hana – On August 13th, 2019 we updated the sizing for the Hana, it then ran true to size. We originally recommended a full size larger than your usual size prior to that date. Note: The natural cotton canvas may require a brief break in period.*

Lena – The Lena fits true to size, however if you are between sizes, we recommend choosing the larger size. The natural cotton canvas can start out snug, and may require a brief break in period.*

Cassie – On August 18th, 2019 we updated the sizing for the Cassie. We then recommended choosing 1/2 size larger than your usual size. We originally recommended a full size larger than your usual size prior to that date.*

Pacifica – On October 18th, 2019 we updated the sizing for the Pacifica. We then recommended choosing 1/2 size larger than your usual size. We originally recommended a full size larger than your usual size prior to that date.*

Boaty – On October 8th, 2019 we updated the sizing for the Boaty. We then recommended choosing 1/2 size larger than your usual size. We originally recommended a full size larger than your usual size prior to that date.*

Vienna – On August 9th, 2019 we updated the sizing for the Vienna. We then recommended choosing 1/2 size larger than your usual size. We originally recommended a full size larger than your usual size prior to that date.*

*Please note our sizing recommendations are based on customer feedback and do not ensure a proper fit.

settings.text:
• All of our men’s shoes are wider than conventional men’s shoes. If you normally wear a larger size to get a wider fit in conventional shoes, you may not have to do that with Xero Shoes.
  • Natural materials (like leather or canvas) may stretch during initial wear.
  • If you think of your foot as particularly narrow, you can consider ordering a women’s style. Many of our male customers find a great fit in our women’s styles. Just be sure to adjust the size by 1.5 (for example a men’s 7 is the same as a women’s 8.5).
  • People like different types of fit — some like their toes near the end, others like 1/4″-1/2″ of extra space.

settings.text:
• All of our women’s shoes are wider than conventional women’s shoes. If you normally wear a larger size to get a wider fit in conventional shoes, you may not have to do that with Xero Shoes.
  • Natural materials (like leather or canvas) may stretch during initial wear.
  • If you think of your foot as particularly wide, you can consider ordering a men’s style. Many of our female customers find a great fit in our men’s styles. Just be sure to adjust the size by 1.5 (for example a men’s 7 is the same as a women’s 8.5).
  • People like different types of fit — some like their toes near the end, others like 1/4″-1/2″ of extra space.

settings.text:
• All of our women’s shoes are wider than conventional women’s shoes. If you normally wear a larger size to get a wider fit in conventional shoes, you may not have to do that with Xero Shoes.
  • Natural materials (like leather or canvas) may stretch during initial wear.
  • If you think of your foot as particularly wide, you can consider ordering a men’s style. Many of our female customers find a great fit in our men’s styles. Just be sure to adjust the size by 1.5 (for example a men’s 7 is the same as a women’s 8.5).
  • People like different types of fit — some like their toes near the end, others like 1/4″-1/2″ of extra space.
2 Simple Steps to the Correct Fit

• Find your usual shoe size on the charts below. For the Z-Trek in particular, try 1 size smaller than your usual size.
  • Verify the fit by printing the appropriate size template and comparing it to your foot. This step is very important for getting a great fit the first time.

• The Genesis and the original Cloud are unisex styles. For example a men’s 7 is the same exact shoe as a women’s 8.
  • The Aqua Cloud, Z-Trek and Z-Trail come in wider widths for men’s sizes and narrower widths for women’s sizes. However, many men with narrow feet find a great fit in the women’s sizes, and many women with wider feet find a great fit in the men’s sizes.
  • The Z-Trek is our only sandal that fits larger than expected for many customers. For example, many customers who are a size 9 in the Genesis, Cloud and Z-Trail are a size 8 in the Z-Trek.
  • The soles of the Genesis, original Cloud and Z-Trek are very thin and flexible. We recommend a snug fit for these styles.
  • The sole of the Z-Trail is thicker than our other sandals, so customers can get a roomier fit on this style, if preferred.
  • Click here to use our Shoe Finder to find the best sandals for you!
Watch the video below to see how to use the template. For the Venture and original Cloud, the toe post position is very important. For the Z-Trek and Z-Trail, the overall fit is what matters most.

settings.text: Note: Be sure to print the templates at Actual Size (100% Scale) and verify with a ruler after printing.

We want to make sure you get the correct size and enjoy your Xero Shoes. If you have any questions, call us at 303.447.3100 or contact us.
